thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of optimalprint.co.uk
thread.title: Ovidiu Negru

author: Ovidiu Negru
title: Ovidiu Negru
text: Very nice invitation. I asked for 30 and got 32. Nice package. Envelopes included.very cheap everything. Got the invitations in 2 days from order. I choose to put a pic on the cover and tbh i expected to be a bit blur but no . All good.actually looking better then the one seen on site. Their site is amazing.gives u many choices .thank u optimalprint. I gave few invitations and ppl loved it
